'''Journey to the West Skin Pack'''<ref>{{Cite|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160208111302/http://www.mojang.com/2016/02/journey-to-the-west-skin-pack-now-on-pe-and-windows-10/|website=Mojang.com|title=Journey to the West skins now on PE and Windows 10|author=Owen Hill|date=February 6, 2016}}</ref> is a [[skin pack]] that includes 15 skins themed around characters from the classic Chinese novel ''[[wikipedia:Journey to the West|Journey to the West]]''.

== Trivia ==

* The pack is available as a default skin pack in [[Minecraft Education|''Minecraft Education'']], being the only one based off an external property.
*The original novel was the inspiration for ''[[Wikipedia:Dragon Ball|Dragon Ball]]'' and by extension ''[[Dragon Ball Z]]''
